content: कुट् {vI.v} {c6c} <ab>P.</ab> (कुटति, कुटित) {@--1@} To be crooked or curved. {@--2@} To curve or bend. {@--3@} To act dishonestly, cheat, deceive. {vII.v} {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> (कुट्यति) {@--1@} To break to pieces, break asunder, divide, split; <ls>Pt. 2.</ls> {@--2@} To speak indistinctly. {@--3@} To be warm, burn.
